name: Into the Chess
description:
Gameplay: It is a classic chess game, but instead of being played on a 2D board it is 3D. This means that the player walks on the board in between the chess pieces. The player can move their chess pieces using the terminal on the backside of the chess piece.
The game is turn based so after player 1 makes his/her move player 2 can then follow up with their move. The gameplay is inspired from the chess game in "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone (2001)".

Theme: The room where the game takes place has a medieval theme to it.

This is my graduation project.
